summary:
Face model for Nastu Dragneel of Fairy Tail.

Credits: even though not included in the model all the the background and clothes are of the author TennoKage (username daeneyr1) in her mod Fairy Tail Follower and Race overhaul at http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60002/?
descriptionHtml:
NEEDS:
-SKSE download at: http://skse.silverlock.org/
-RaceMenu download at: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?
-ApachiiSkyHair download at: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?

Recommended:
-ShowRaceMenu Precache Killer download at: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33526/?

To install go to your Skyrim folder 
Steam - C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\SteamApps\common\Skyrim
Other - C:\Program Files (x86)\Oblivion Skyrim

Then go C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\SteamApps\common\Skyrim\Data\SKSE\Plugins\CharGen
and place the zip file in there and unpack it.

In-game you will have to open the race menu (with the command 'showracemenu' or start a new game) and goto the sculpt tap in the top right of the screen, then click on the load thingy down at the bottom left and it should be in the popup.
click or double click whichever gets it to load then press r on the keyboard and finish with the charater creation as usual. :)
author: TheForsakened
